IssueTracker.Title: Database Connection Timeout
IssueTracker.Description: SQL Management Studio is experiencing frequent timeout errors when connecting to the main database server. Users report delays of 30+ seconds before connection failure.

IssueTracker.Title: Printer Not Responding
IssueTracker.Description: HP LaserJet Pro printer in Building A is not responding to print jobs. Print queue shows jobs as pending but nothing prints.
IssueTracker.ResolutionNotes: Checking network connectivity and driver updates

IssueTracker.Title: License Expiration Alert
IssueTracker.Description: Adobe Creative Suite licenses are expiring in 14 days. Need to renew corporate license agreement.

IssueTracker.Title: Network Connectivity Issues
IssueTracker.Description: Building A WiFi network is experiencing intermittent connectivity issues. Users report frequent disconnections.

IssueTracker.Title: Excel Formula Error
IssueTracker.Description: Monthly report template showing #REF! errors in calculated fields after recent Excel update.
IssueTracker.ResolutionNotes: Updated formula references to be compatible with Excel 365

IssueTracker.Title: VPN Connection Drops
IssueTracker.Description: Remote workers experiencing frequent VPN disconnections during peak hours.
IssueTracker.ResolutionNotes: Upgraded VPN server capacity and optimized connection protocols

IssueTracker.Title: Backup Process Failure
IssueTracker.Description: Nightly backup process failed for the document management system. Last successful backup was 3 days ago.
IssueTracker.ResolutionNotes: Fixed storage space issue and updated backup configuration

IssueTracker.Title: Email Client Sync Issues
IssueTracker.Description: Outlook not syncing emails properly with Exchange server. Some emails delayed by several hours.
IssueTracker.ResolutionNotes: Rebuilt Outlook profile and updated Exchange configuration

ToolReleases.Title: Hyperlink Fix Macro v2.1
ToolReleases.ReleaseNotes: Fixed bug with Excel hyperlinks pointing to SharePoint documents. Improved performance when processing large spreadsheets. Added support for relative hyperlinks.

ToolReleases.Title: Feedback Importer Script v1.8
ToolReleases.ReleaseNotes: Added support for CSV imports from customer feedback systems. Enhanced error handling for malformed data. Improved logging and reporting capabilities.

ToolReleases.Title: Data Analysis Tool v3.2
ToolReleases.ReleaseNotes: New dashboard features with interactive charts and graphs. Improved data visualization options including heat maps and trend analysis. Enhanced export capabilities.

ToolReleases.Title: Report Generator v1.5
ToolReleases.ReleaseNotes: Updated report templates with modern design. Fixed formatting issues with PDF exports. Added new template options for quarterly and annual reports.

ToolReleases.Title: Network Monitor Tool v2.0
ToolReleases.ReleaseNotes: Complete rewrite with improved user interface. Real-time network monitoring dashboard. Enhanced alerting system with email and SMS notifications.

WorkInstructions.Title: Hyperlink Fix Macro: Installation Guide
WorkInstructions.Description: Step-by-step instructions for installing and configuring the Hyperlink Fix Macro in Excel

WorkInstructions.Title: Hyperlink Fix Macro: Troubleshooting Common Issues
WorkInstructions.Description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving common issues with the Hyperlink Fix Macro

WorkInstructions.Title: Feedback Importer Script: Setup and Configuration
WorkInstructions.Description: Complete guide for setting up and configuring the Feedback Importer Script

WorkInstructions.Title: Feedback Importer Script: Data Format Requirements
WorkInstructions.Description: Specifications for data formats supported by the Feedback Importer Script

WorkInstructions.Title: Data Analysis Tool: User Manual
WorkInstructions.Description: Comprehensive user manual for the Data Analysis Tool dashboard features

WorkInstructions.Title: Report Generator: Template Customization Guide
WorkInstructions.Description: Instructions for customizing and creating new report templates

NewsAnnouncements.Title: Tool Management Hub Now Live
NewsAnnouncements.Description: Our new streamlined platform is now available! Report issues faster and access documentation more efficiently than ever before. The new hub consolidates all tool-related resources in one central location.

NewsAnnouncements.Title: New Mobile App Available
NewsAnnouncements.Description: Submit issues on-the-go with our new mobile-responsive interface. Access everything from your smartphone or tablet. The mobile app includes all desktop features optimized for touch interfaces.

NewsAnnouncements.Title: Performance Improvements
NewsAnnouncements.Description: We've optimized load times and improved the user experience based on your feedback. Pages now load 50% faster! Database queries have been optimized and caching has been implemented.

NewsAnnouncements.Title: Scheduled Maintenance Window
NewsAnnouncements.Description: System maintenance is scheduled for this Saturday from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM. During this time, some services may be temporarily unavailable. Please plan accordingly.

NewsAnnouncements.Title: New Training Resources Available
NewsAnnouncements.Description: Updated training materials and video tutorials are now available in the Work Instructions section. Learn about the latest features and best practices for tool usage.

importInstructions.step1: Create each SharePoint list using the corresponding schema
importInstructions.step2: Import this sample data to test the Power Apps functionality
importInstructions.step3: Adjust dates to current timeframe if needed
importInstructions.step4: Update URLs to match your SharePoint environment
importInstructions.step5: Test all connections and data sources in Power Apps

issueTracker.note: ReportedDate and ResolvedDate should be updated to reflect current dates for testing

toolReleases.note: ReleaseDate should be recent for 'Latest Updates' section to display properly

workInstructions.note: DocumentUrl should point to actual SharePoint documents in your environment

newsAnnouncements.note: Set IsActive to true for items to appear in the app
